intro: Sedum yunnanense, commonly known as the Yunnan stonecrop, is a succulent plant native to China. It is characterized by its fleshy, upright stems and clusters of small, star-shaped flowers that range in color from yellow to orange. The plant thrives in rocky, well-drained soils and is often found in alpine or mountainous regions. It has adapted to harsh climates with its ability to store water in its leaves. Sedum yunnanense is valued in horticulture for its ornamental appeal and low maintenance requirements.
